General.Name: Panagene Inc
General.Description: Panagene Inc. develops products in the field of molecular diagnostics in South Korea. Its products include Liquid biopsy products for lung and colon cancers; tissue biopsy products for lung, thyroid, pancreatic, and colon cancers, as well as glioblastoma, myeloproliferative neoplasm, chronic myelogenous leukemia, central nervous system, myelofibrosis, and polycythemia vera diseases. The company also offers products for cervical cancer, sexually transmitted, and extreme drug resistance diseases; and peptide nucleic acid products. The company was formerly known as Koram Panagene Ltd. and changed its name to Panagene Inc. in January 2009. Panagene Inc. was incorporated in 1976 and is based in Daejeon, South Korea.

6.Name: Hee-Kyung  Park
6.Title: Head of Laboratory and Managing Director
